attributes.action: Adopt a more lenient policy on parking fines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local councils appear to be adopting a zero tolerance approach toward incorrect parking. While fines issued are often correct according to the letter of the law, they violate the spirit of parking regulations in their lack of leniency. Parking fines that are issued overzealously are those where the offender has in no way inconvenienced another road user or pedestrian through their parking.
